snippet: Though it was the first Sugar Bowl without a top-10 team since 1945, No. 17 Virginia Tech and No. 13 Michigan managed to cobble together an exciting finish and dramatic overtime.
abstract: Michigan defeats Virginia Tech, 23-20, in college football's Sugar Bowl.
lead_paragraph: Though it was the first Sugar Bowl without a top-10 team since 1945, No. 17 Virginia Tech and No. 13 Michigan managed to cobble together an exciting finish and dramatic overtime.

headline.seo: Sugar Bowl — Michigan Prevails in Exciting Finish to Uninspired Matchup and Game
headline.main: Michigan Prevails in an Exciting Conclusion to an Uninspiring Game
headline.print_headline: Michigan Prevails in an Exciting Conclusion to an Uninspiring Game
headline.content_kicker: Sugar Bowl: Michigan 23, Virginia Tech 20, Overtime
